definition: frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to add hail to snow (idiom); one disaster on top of another/to make things worse in a bad situation
as cold as ice and frost (idiom, usually of woman); icy manner/frigid
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
weather-beaten/having experienced the hardships of life
frost forming a pattern on a surface/rime

sentences.english: When your hair became white, then, i can know , you are mine.
sentences.chinese: 當你鬢已成霜，我才能確定你是我的。

sentences.english: Spread abundant quantities of cream and massage carefully until absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 塗抹足量的霜，並且仔細按摩，直至完全吸收。

sentences.english: The form of mercury used in skin lightening soaps and creams is inorganic mercury.
sentences.chinese: 美白香皂和麪霜中所使用的汞是無機形式的汞。

sentences.english: Cloud dream frost looking at to sink to eliminate yet always doesn't talk.
sentences.chinese: 雲夢霜看着沉消卻始終沒有說話。

sentences.english: FROST】Frost has killed several of our young plants.
sentences.chinese: 霜已搞壞了我們好幾株幼苗。

sentences.english: The reed is exhuberant frosted with the crystal white dew.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦初生青青，白色露水凝結爲霜。

sentences.english: Today, I decided to try a self-tanning lotion my friend had recommended. I put it on, and decided to take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 今天我試用了一下朋友推薦的曬黑霜，然後去睡覺。

sentences.english: Put a little frost on your hand. What happens to the frost?
sentences.chinese: 把小許霜放在手上。霜會發生什麼變化？

sentences.english: I am Warchief of the Horde, he said proudly.
sentences.chinese: 我是霜狼氏族的酋長，他驕傲地說。

sentences.english: Shen resists the frost wouldn t do him any good impression left early.
sentences.chinese: 沈傲霜對他沒什麼好印象早早的就走了。

sentences.english: Frost consists of tiny crystals of ice which grow outward from a solid surface.
sentences.chinese: 霜包括從堅實表面增長向外冰的微小的水晶。

sentences.english: We always suggest our Wonder-Full Balm for scuffs, cuts and little burns.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是建議使用奇蹟修復霜用於刀傷燙傷。

sentences.english: This is still in three thousand 24 bridge, hair cream white, old people still forget to.
sentences.chinese: 二十四橋今仍在，三千青絲霜發白，舊人猶忘來。

sentences.english: BB Cream and Cream can be generic?
You can try using a moisturizer or cream -- or wearing long-sleeved shirts.
sentences.chinese: 使用潤膚霜，精華霜，或者乾脆穿長袖吧。

sentences.english: First frost comes in the night, a clear, scant-started night when the moon is near its fullness.
sentences.chinese: 在一個月圓星稀之夜，第一場霜降臨了。

definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
frost forming a pattern on a surface/rime
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
